verses.verse: And I-yov <WH347> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
No doubt <WH551> but ye are the people <WH5971>, and wisdom <WH2451> shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> with you.
But <WH1571> I have understanding <WH3824> as well as you; I am not inferior <WH5307> <WH8802> to you: yea, who knoweth not such things <WH3644> as these?

I am as one mocked <WH7814> of his neighbour <WH7453>, who calleth <WH7121> <WH8802> upon 'Elohim <WH433>, and he answereth <WH6030> <WH8799> him: the just <WH6662> upright <WH8549> man is laughed to scorn <WH7814>.
He that is ready <WH3559> <WH8737> to slip <WH4571> <WH8802> with his feet <WH7272> is as a Menorah <WH3940> despised <WH937> in the thought <WH6248> of him that is at ease <WH7600>.

The tabernacles <WH168> of robbers <WH7703> <WH8802> prosper <WH7951> <WH8799>, and they that provoke <WH7264> <WH8688> 'Elohim <WH410> are secure <WH987>; into whose hand <WH3027> 'Elohim <WH433> bringeth <WH935> <WH8689> abundantly.
But <WH199> ask <WH7592> <WH8798> now the beasts <WH929>, and they shall teach <WH3384> <WH8686> thee; and the fowls <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and they shall tell <WH5046> <WH8686> thee:
Or speak <WH7878> <WH8798> to the earth <WH776>, and it shall teach <WH3384> <WH8686> thee: and the fishes <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220> shall declare <WH5608> <WH8762> unto thee.
Who knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> not in all these that the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> hath wrought <WH6213> <WH8804> this?
In whose hand <WH3027> is the soul <WH5315> of every living thing <WH2416>, and the breath <WH7307> of all mankind <WH376> <WH1320>.
Doth not the ear <WH241> try <WH974> <WH8799> words <WH4405>? and the mouth <WH2441> taste <WH2938> <WH8799> his meat <WH400> ?
With the ancient <WH3453> is wisdom <WH2451>; and in length <WH753> of days <WH3117> understanding <WH8394>.
With him is wisdom <WH2451> and strength <WH1369>, he hath counsel <WH6098> and understanding <WH8394>.
Behold, he breaketh down <WH2040> <WH8799>, and it cannot be built again <WH1129> <WH8735>: he shutteth up <WH5462> <WH8799> a man <WH376>, and there can be no opening <WH6605> <WH8735>.
Behold, he withholdeth <WH6113> <WH8799> the waters <WH4325>, and they dry up <WH3001> <WH8799>: also he sendeth them out <WH7971> <WH8762>, and they overturn <WH2015> <WH8799> the earth <WH776>.
With him is strength <WH5797> and wisdom <WH8454>: the deceived <WH7683> <WH8802> and the deceiver <WH7686> <WH8688> are his.
He leadeth <WH3212> <WH8688> counsellors <WH3289> <WH8802> away spoiled <WH7758>, and maketh the judges <WH8199> <WH8802> fools <WH1984> <WH8779>.
He looseht <WH6605> <WH8765> the bond <WH4148> of kings <WH4428>, and girdeth <WH631> <WH8799> their loins <WH4975> with a girdle <WH232>.
He leadeth <WH3212> <WH8688> princes <WH3548> away spoiled <WH7758>, and overthroweth <WH5557> <WH8762> the mighty <WH386>.
He removeth away <WH5493> <WH8688> the speech <WH8193> of the trusty <WH539> <WH8737>, and taketh away <WH3947> <WH8799> the understanding <WH2940> of the aged <WH2205>.
He poureth <WH8210> <WH8802> contempt <WH937> upon princes <WH5081>, and weakeneth <WH7503> <WH8765> the strength <WH4206> of the mighty <WH650>.
He discovereth <WH1540> <WH8764> deep things <WH6013> out of darkness <WH2822>, and bringeth out <WH3318> <WH8686> to light <WH216> the shadow of death <WH6757>.
He increaseht <WH7679> <WH8688> the nations <WH1471>, and destroyeth <WH6> <WH8762> them: he enlargeth <WH7849> <WH8802> the nations <WH1471>, and straiteneth <WH5148> <WH8686> them again.

He taketh away <WH5493> <WH8688> the heart <WH3820> of the chief <WH7218> of the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776>, and causeht them to wander <WH8582> <WH8686> in a wilderness <WH8414> where there is no way <WH1870>.
They grope <WH4959> <WH8762> in the dark <WH2822> without light <WH216>, and he maketh them to stagger <WH8582> <WH8686> like a drunken <WH7910> man.
